title: King Charles at Westminster
itunes:title: King Charles at Westminster
description:
The new King addresses parliament and vows to uphold democracy. Elsewhere, the UK's economic crises rumble on. We discuss both with Theresa May's de facto deputy, former cabinet minister, David Lidington. Bloomberg's Yuan Potts and Stephen Carroll also hear from former Bank of England policymaker Andrew Sentance on the economic clouds gathering and the challenges facing the central bank. Plus: our reporter Lizzy Burden joins us from outside Buckingham Palace. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
